artview.plugins.FileDetail¶

class artview.plugins.FileDetail(dirIn=None, name='FileDetail', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Open an interactive button driven file advancement.

__init__(dirIn=None, name='FileDetail', parent=None)[source]¶

Initialize the class to create the interface.

Parameters:

[Optional] :

dirIn: string :

Initial directory path to open.

name : string

Window name.

parent : PyQt instance

Parent instance to associate to this class. If None, then Qt owns, otherwise associated with parent PyQt instance.

Methods

FileDetail.createLongUI() Choose to save full information from Radar instance.
FileDetail.createShortUI() Choose to save minimal information from Radar instance.
FileDetail.guiStart([parent]) Graphical interface for starting this class.
FileDetail.showSaveDialog(fsuggest, txt)

Attributes

see Shared Variables Table

see Shared Variables Table
